## BaseSearchConfig interface

The base configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-core.answerscore.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseSearchConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [endpoints?](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.endpoints.md) | [Endpoints](./answers-core.endpoints.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Overrides for the URLs which are used when making requests to the Answers API. |
|  [experienceKey](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.experiencekey.md) | string | The experience key of the answers experience. |
|  [experienceVersion?](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.experienceversion.md) | 'STAGING' \| 'PRODUCTION' \| string \| number | <i>(Optional)</i> The version of the answers experience configuration. |
